title: Irma Olguin: Why We Should Bring Tech Economies to Underdog Cities - NPR
content: Irma Olguin: Why We Should Bring Tech Economies to Underdog Cities  NPR
description: Irma Olguin wants to bring the tech industry to cities like her hometown, Fresno. She believes building a support system for tech workers will strengthen communities and revitalize undervalued cities.
